## AST.mutate() method

Probilistically replaces randomly chosen tree nodes with a new random AST of given `maxDepth` (default: 1). Never mutates root.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mutate(tree: ASTNode<OP, T>, maxDepth?: number): ASTNode<OP, T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tree | <code>ASTNode&lt;OP, T&gt;</code> |  |
|  maxDepth | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ASTNode<OP, T>`
